content: WHAT CRASH?¬† WHAT CORRECTION??!? WHAT BEAR MARKET??   ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†Yes...I am still in a good mood so giving out a CYPHER HODL 3d PRINTED COIN ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†KEEP ON HODLING FELLAS!!!¬† ¬† ¬† I have some 3D priinted coin prototypes that I will give away...it also comes with a used holo as I was experimenting with these.¬†Free shipping in the USA, if overseas I can ship to MinerJones and you pay him for handling and reshippingOnly one spot per person.No NEWBIES registered anytime after 1st JulyONLY ONE RULE>> PICK A¬† NUMBER NO RANDOMS PLEASE..sorry randoms will be ignored0¬† Saxoshi¬† 1CARIBBEAN_TREASURES 2 GazetaBitcoin 3 dcarter 4 Darker 5 Heisty 67 Mitchell¬† 8 iBitcoinHongKong8 9 Mbitr 10 zipreg 11 Abiky 12 Ramelius¬† 13 Geo¬† 14¬† ChiBitCTy 1516 Crytocanuk >17 Otillo¬† 18 buck 192021 mx12.levins 22232425 mikeywith26 MrMojo¬† 27 Doblezero 28 Maus0728 29 generalt¬† ¬†30313233 2stout 34 yoda353637 Dernoste¬† 383940 bitbollo 41424344¬† Remsjack 45464748 Hotdog7 4950 minerjones¬† 51 Mark 52 oluain53¬† turbodogma¬† 5455 Hookz¬† 56 iced >575859606162636465¬† philipma1957 6667¬† TheBeardedBaby 6869¬† sheenshane 70 Owlz¬† 71 bitcoiner24h 7273747576 MoparMiningLLC¬† 7778798081 coinage 8283 haloxon 848586 AMAX 8788 The_Crypto_Kid¬† 8990 tranthidung¬† 919293 Cryptogreatdane9495969798 Eclipse33 99 Fattcatt¬† ¬†¬† ¬†I also suggest using¬† privnote.com to send me your addy via PM once raffle winner wants to get in touch with me.Its for your privacy.¬† ¬† You have to reach out to me when winning. I am not responsible for any failed deliveries.¬†I am sending out of the goodness of my heart and that's it.¬† ¬†This applied to all auctions in the past and future ones as well as the thread says. Thanks¬† ¬†PLEASE PLACE YOUR INFO AS FOLLOWS WHEN PLACING YOUR LETTER OR NUMBERC KROGOTHMANHATTANIt makes my life easier to copy and pasteAnd it keeps me in a good mood too!
